name: Alternative Pong
description:
[Edit: Flash is no longer supported by most browsers]

The music in the game does not belong to me, it belongs to rinx2musixxx. Please support them ^^ : https://soundcloud.com/rinx2musixxx/shinkirou-set. (P.s. I did not know it was Mamizou's theme at the time)

Based on the original Pong game, there are new features added. 

- The shift key on either side will cut down the speed of the ball in any direction.

- The star in the centre will spin when there is imbalance in score. When the ball flies over it, its speed will be altered randomly.
